1111.content:
Robin remembers all the stuff that Kid Flash dropped off last week. There'd been some kind of giant fight in Keystone City that had damaged the Flash museum. Kid Flash said that Flash stored weapons that he'd confiscated from super villains in a special storage area at the Flash museum but that a fight with some villains had compromised its integrity.

So, Kid Flash was instructed by Flash to bring a half dozen super weapons to Titans Tower for temporary safe storage. The xinothium energy ray from the villain Heat Wave was pretty easy to figure out. So was Captain Cold's cold ray. Duh. Obvious molecule interaction minimizer circuitry. A couple of the others were pretty standard villain stuff, thought Robin. Kid Flash thought the Flashes fought tougher villains than him and Batman.
No way!
But the last weapon in the bundle, a bazooka sized gun with all sorts of little controls and settings knobs puzzled him. He stared at it from multiple angles while Kid Flash secured other ray guns in the impregnable Titans Tower storage vault.
"Hey, what's this one?" asked the boy wonder lifting it up and aiming it at his slender pal.
Kid Flash sped to his side, a red and yellow blur and pushed the muzzel end of the device downward in a fraction of a second.
"Hey! Watch that! I'm seeing Jinx again tonight. I want my speedster buns just the way they are. Perfect."
"Huh?"
"It's the fat ray, boy blunder."
"Hey! Don't call me that. The what?!"
"The fat ray. Gorilla Grodd used this once to make Flash weigh a thousand pounds. "
Robin smirked. The idea was pretty funny. One of the sleek Flashes blimped out to weigh a thousand pounds.
"How's it work?" Robin had asked.
Kid Flash had sighed and then refused to tell him. This irked Robin. He was the responsible one. Who was Kid Flash to not trust him?! He said something about Flash having only not destroyed it to see if any technologies useful for good and not evil could be extracted from it.
Robin remembered what Kid Flash had said as he opened up the heavy door to the Titans Tower storage area. He pulled the supposed fat ray from its storage bin and examined it. There sure were a lot of dials. Maybe I should contact Kid Flash before trying to use this . . .
1111.title: Just the thing!  The fat ray gun used on Flash!

11112.content:
Robin sighed and flipped open his communicator. It was the only responsible thing to do. "Kid Flash! Come in. Kid Flash! This is Robin! Please answer!"
Not a second later, Kid Flash's handsome face, framed by his bright red hair was showing on the screen. He was out of uniform. It looked, from the background like he was in some kind of restaurant. He glanced quickly to each side then spoke in a near whisper.
"What is it?"
Robin was momentarily perplexed. "Um, I, uh, I need your help here at the Tower. I-"
He was about to explain the situation when he heard a voice from off screen.
"What is that? You told me you were going to leave it at home! You promised me!" Then it seemed like he must have put it down because Kid Flash's face moved off screen and the view Robin had was stuck on the ceiling of that same restaurant. Offscreen, Robin could hear Kid Flash trying to calm Jinx down.
"Sorry, baby. It's force of habit. I didn't even mean to take it."
"Yeah, right. You're addicted to the whole deal. You'll never change and make allowances for being with me!"
From that point their voices moved further away and it was a full minute later before a very irritated Kid Flash returned to the screen Robin saw.
"Thanks a lot Robin! My girlfriend just walked out on dinner and judging from how angry she is the lovin' dessert I was hoping for is out of the question. Now, what is it?"
Luckily, Kid Flash couldn't see the nervous look in his eyes behind his mask. Robin repeated his request that Kid Flash speed to the Tower without further explanation. 30 seconds later, the teen speedster zipped into the room and stood beside Robin in his skin tight red and yellow uniform. He still looked irritated.
His look didn't improve much when Robin outlined his plan.
"You . . want to use the fat ray to make yourself a little pudgy to appeal to Starfire?"
Robin nodded.
"Seriously?"
Robin nodded again and Kid Flash shook his head. "Are you crazy? This is the way to be," said Kid Flash patting the 8 visible squares of stomach muscles under his uniform and then the equally toned abs of his friend. "You're in great shape dude. Why would you ruin it?"
"If Starfire wants-wants . . pudgy, I'll be pudgy. It'll just be temporary but it'll show her how serious I am. You understand that, don't you? Don't you make sacrifices to please Jinx?"
Kid Flash sighed. "If you only knew."
"So, how 'bout it?" asked Robin picking up the bazooka sized fat ray gun. "Fatten me up just a bit."
Kid Flash nodded. "I don't get it. But, okay. There's only one problem."
"What?"
"Flash never finished explaining to me how this one works."
"What?!"
"Well, I'm sure we can figure out the other parts."
A disappointed Robin rolled his eyes and the two slender teens started fiddling with the dials and switches on it, both adjusting at the same time and not sufficiently noting what the other was doing.
All of a sudden the thing hummed to life and a couple dials started to glow. Robin turned a nob that he thought was sort of a safety, thinking that he was setting the safety and preventing an accidental use of it.
"No, don't touch that one!" barked the speedster but it was too late as a green light came out the muzzle end of the gun.

111122.content:
A greenish light started shooting out the muzzle end of the bazook sized ray gun. Robin had the thing pointed away from himself but the green ray shot out at a wide angle and when Kid Flash tried to reach a certain knob to turn it off he only succeeded in pointing the gun at the lower half of Robin's body.
" . . oh . . "
Even thought the ray had only hit him from the thighs down, Robin's whole body now tingled in a way he'd never felt before. He wasn't sure what to do. He stopped resisting Kid Flash's efforts to pull it from him. But this only turned the ray on the lower half of Kid Flash's body just as his efforts to flip the safety back on resulted in him turning a knob next to it from its setting of A to the alternate setting of P. Finally he reached the right knob and turned the thing off. It clattered to the hard Tower floor just as his whole body was engulfed in a tingly feeling that was totally new to him.
". . oh . . "
As he tried to figure out what was happening to himself, he saw Robin's belly expanding and the buttons popping off his red uniform top. Frantically, Robin reached for and undid his utility belt. It scuffed across the floor as the sound of spandex ripping filled the room. Robin's green leggings were shredding as was the seat of his pants and even the jock he wore underneath. But he never saw his pal's equipment. His gut was expanding as though a fire hose was pumping water into it and it immediately hung down to his much wider thighs. At the same time, Robin's face turned puffy, his chest started looking saggy and even his arms and fingers seemed saggy and puffed out to their physical limit.
Robin groaned. He could see his reflection in the stainless steel door to the storage room. He'd obviously gained a lot more than the maximum 100 pounds he'd intended.
Kid Flash, still feeling that bizarre tingle, looked on in horror. He loved his sleek, speedster physique and totally identified with it. Fat was . . . He shuddered at the sight of his pal. Easily 600 pounds.
But no sooner had he filled with revulsion than he felt an incredible sensation behind him and reached back with both red gloved hands. He was just in time to feel his round speedster butt expand outward as though the same fire hose that had filled Robin with blubber was now turned on him. In just a few seconds, his buns ballooned backward and outward till they were the size of a pair of oversized beach balls. His thighs were becoming similarly gargantuan. His upper body filled with fat, his face becoming puffy and his chest sagging with an advanced case of gynecomastia. His belly expanded too, but it was clear that his shape was different than Robin's. And, thankfully, his Kid Flash suit was tremendously stretchy and enlarged to still fit him. But he now understood what the switch that had two settings, A and P was for. Robin had been fattened in the apple shape with his tremendous new weight centered around his midsection. He'd been fattened in a pear shape, his hips becoming even much more enormous than Robin's, his buns blimping out till they extended two feet back of him, his center of gravity lowered as gravity's pull on him was multiplied many times over.
The two formerly fat free teen hereoes looked at each other in silence for a few seconds as they tried to regain their balance in their new lardass bodies.
"Nice going Blimp Wonder."
"And you're blameless, Kid Fat?"
Kid Flash advanced and pushed his huge gut against his friend's even larger one.
"You had to turn it on!"
"And you just had to point it at me! Look at me! I make that loser villain Control Freak look like an anorexic. At least my butt's as big as yours, though!"
Kid Flash rolled his eyes. "At least my gut's not as big as yours, mud slide."
"God of Thunder Thighs!"
The two angry teen heroes looked at each other a moment then broke into smiles. Neither could stay mad at his best friend.
"Okay, okay," said Robin. "Let's just fix this quick before the others see us. How did Flash get out of this one?"
Kid Flash sighed. "He said he went into a sauna and sweated the weight off."
"What?! That'll take days . . . at least!"
Kid Flash nodded reluctantly.
"Well, there's a freight scale just around the corner from here. Let's see how bad we are."
Kid Flash waddled at high speed around the corner and stepped across the stainless steel square and stared at the digital display.
677
"I weigh six hundred seventy seven pounds!" he shouted in disbelief despite the sight and feel of his enormously heavy body in his red and yellow suit. "I'm only five eleven!"
"Your ass might be five eleven across, now," said Robin with a slap to one elephantine buttock. Kid Flash stepped aside and Robin waddled atop the scale. The red, digital number display moved too fast to see any one number before settling at . .
637
"I weigh six hundred thirty seven pounds!" Robin muttered squeezing at his spherical body with his arms as if needing to confirm the number. "God."

The two teen heroes, incredibly toned just five minutes ago stood there trying to deal with the enormity of their enormity. They were only snapped out of it by the -ding!- of the elevator opening and Starfire stepping out, her jaw dropping at the sight of them.

15.content:
It was just another City Hall ceremony. Thanks for saving Jump City, Titans. Been there done that. Raven disliked these ceremonies at this point. It seemed like the mayor used them as political rallies for himself. She could barely stand to look at him. We'd have saved the City just as certainly if the other candidates were in your office, you jerk!
Oh well, she told herself while waiting with the others for his speech to end, at least they got some first hand evidence of the mood of the general public. Raven was particularly interested in the reactions to the Titans of the girls in the audience. Sure, there was some ogling of Robin and Beast boy. That sort of thing was even worse with Kid Flash. She wanted to condemn it but she couldn't deny that the speedster was awfully cute. Gods, those buns. But more than their reactions to the male Titans she was interested in their reaction to her and Starfire.
She'd become increasingly upset at how girls seemed to see them. At first, the disturbing undertones weren't so obvious that she couldn't tell herself things were otherwise. But, at the last such ceremony she'd overheard two anorexic looking blond girls berating two chubby girls for identifying with her and Starfire.
"Like, why don't you fatties root for a villain or something? All the hero girls are thin or haven't you noticed?"
"Like, duh. Fat equals bad," said the other blond girl.
Raven had turned around and seen that the two girls being verbally attacked weren't even especially fat. She'd gone home from the ceremony to her room at the Tower and looked at her slender, beauty's body in the mirror and didn't feel at all good about it. She'd never wanted to be the club used by some girls to hit other girls over the head.
Now, at this ceremony, she overheard two average shape girls in the front row of the audience talking about how they could never be like Raven and talking in dispiriting terms about their own bodies. Raven looked at them. They were maybe 10 pounds overweight, tops.
Anger welled up in her, anger that only increased when the mayor asked her to say a few words with an introduction of "And now a few words from the beautiful . . Raven!"
She marched to the microphone as the crowd applauded.
"Thank you Mr. Mayor. We're all happy to help in any way we can. As for my appearance, well, a spell was cast on me to change my appearance. I've almost broken it. The next time you see me I'll be my real self, looking pretty much the same but much much heavier. Thank you everyone!"
The other Titans were perplexed but she quickly told them that she'd just been saying that. She was her natural shape right now at 5'6" and 115 pounds. But she told them that she'd made a decision. She couldn't stand to have her appearance used as a weapon against some girls. She was going to go fat.
Her teammates were stunned. Robin asked if she would just cast a spell.
That wouldn't work, she explained. She could cast a cloaking spell that would give her the appearance of much greater mass whenever she was maintaining the power of that spell. But she didn't want to divide her concentration for fighting. It would be better to actually be much heavier.
Beast Boy ran one gloved finger up her side from her hip. "Are you sure?"
She nodded. "Didn't Kid Flash drop off for safe keeping some sort of ray gun that can make a person's body gain significant weight almost immediately?"
Robin nodded. "The fat ray gun. He said somebody blimped Flash up to a thousand pounds. It's in our safe storage area."
Raven sighed. "Okay, let's get Kid Flash here to help use it."

Having second thoughts as well as servings
151.content:
Raven just asked Kid Flash to speed to Titans Tower as soon as possible. She figured it'd be easier to explain in person. 10 seconds later the slender speedster was there in his skin tight red and yellow uniform. Like her four original teammates, the teen speedster had a little trouble at first wrapping his mind around what she wanted to do. Down in the Titans Tower storage room he was half trying to talk her out of it as he retrieved the bazooka sized ray gun while the others waited outside for safety.
"So . . you want me to shoot you with the fat ray and . . make you weigh three or four hundred pounds. Really?"
"Three. Four. Five. Whatever. I just want it to be perfectly clear that I'm a hefty girl and a hero."
"Um, wouldn't less weight than that do the trick?"
She looked at the worried expression on his face and chuckled. "You're really uncomfortable with the very idea of fat, aren't you?"
He couldn't face her. "Well . . . yeah. I mean, I'm sorry, but look at me," he said holding his arms out. "Almost six feet tall and a 26 inch waist. S.T.A.R. Labs said I'm 0.4% fat by weight. And that's with eating like 6 meals a day!"
He turned to face her. "But I understand what you're doing and honestly, it's pretty cool. Jinx said something to me about all the role models for girls being bimbo bodied beauties. She-"
"Is that what I am now?" smirked Raven.
He looked away. "Um, no comment."
She chuckled. "Alright. Let's do this. Hit me with your best shot, skinny boy."
"Okay," he said from two feet away in the stainless steel lined room. "This is gonna take a sec. Lot of controls to set here," he added as he turned several knobs and flicked more switches. At last he was ready and nodded to her.
"This isn't very precise. Flash thought he got hit with this ray for about 5 seconds when he zoomed up to a thousand pounds. So, we'll just try a couple seconds."
And with that, he flipped another switch and the device hummed to life. He pulled a trigger and a bright green ray emerged from the muzzle of the ray gun. Raven felt warm and tingly all over her body and then Kid Flash let go of the trigger. But the changes to her body caused by the ray were just starting when he stopped firing.
She felt her belly become convex and then almost ooze into rolls of fat down her sides. Her thighs first touched then overlapped by several inches, the flesh dimpling in the cottage cheese-like texture of advanced cellulite. Her taut butt ballooned outward and her twin perky round breasts expanded in just seconds to nearly the size of cow udders. Atop it all, her face puffed out and her neck fattened till she had four or five extra chins below her actual one.
Luckily, her outfit was stretchy enough to expand to her new dimensions, though her long cape now looked more like Robin's short one, as it barely covered past her hugely expanded waist.
"You okay?" asked a worried Kid Flash.
Raven steadied herself against the wall, trying to adjust to her new feeling of mass. She nodded.
"Allright then, let's quantify this," he said leading her around the corner to a freight scale. Raven found she had to waddle a certain way. Her thighs overlapped too much to walk the way she used to. But she didn't feel that bad about herself. In fact . . .
"Hey!"
She felt good enough to give a healthy swat to skinny ass Kid Flash's buns.
She laughed. "I always wanted to do that."
He looked at her nervously. "Is this affecting you hormonally and psychologically?" he asked as she stepped onto the freight scale.
"Maybe," she shrugged. "Truth is, it doesn't feel bad and I almost feel as though it frees me. I can forget my inhibitions. I-"
She stopped because the blurring red digital display was finally settling on a number.
467
Raven laughed. "I weigh 467 pounds? Wow."
Kid Flash nodded, unsure what to say. She now weighed 300 pounds more than him. He turned around to shut off the machine and, again, she goosed him.
"Hey! Stop that!"
"What're you gonna do about it, stick figure?" she chuckled.
He rolled his eyes. "I'm a speedster," he protested against the denigration of his physique.
"You're a bunster," she laughed swatting his butt one more time before he zipped out of her reach, a red and yellow blur now at the door to the storage room.
"At least you're in good spirits," he said. "I was worried you'd be depressed."
"Nope. I'm jolly," she said and laughed. "Okay, time for the new me to face the world," she said and nodded to the flame haired speedster. He opened the door and she waddled out to face Robin, Beast Boy, Cyborg and Starfire. Their eyes bugged out and their jaws dropped. Their 120 pound teammate stood before them now weighing 467 pounds. No one said anything. The silence was finally broken by Robin's squeal.
"Hey!"
"I always wanted to do that, too," she chuckled about her swat of their leader's butt.
"She, um, she says it feels like she's lost some inhibitions," said Kid Flash rubbing his own butt.
"You are . . most . . large, friend Raven."
Four hundred sixty seven pounds, she told them.
"Is . . is this what you really want, Raven?" asked Beast Boy.
She nodded emphatically.
151.title: Raven, mystic master of . . . cellulite?

choices: Beast Boy demands to get hit with the fat ray, too
Robin demands to be hit with the fat ray
1511.content:
Raven asked Robin to think up an excuse for them to appear in public and Robin did. The Mayor of Jump City was always looking for excuses to be seen in public with the incredibly popular and telegenic young heroes who guarded the City.
Raven watched from off screen as Robin, standing in front of the 6 foot wide screen in the communications center. He was very clever. Didn't you want to give us some sort of junior role models award Mr. Mayor? We've got a little down time now so maybe we could have the ceremony tomorrow morning?
Of course, Robin was making the whole thing up but the Mayor immediately claimed that he had been about to do just that. He said tomorrow at 10 at City Hall would be perfect.
At 10 am the next morning, the Teen Titans arrived to the cheers of a couple thousand fans at the front steps of City Hall. They lined up behind the Mayor at the podium. He grinned at them but then his jaw dropped at the sight of a nearly 500 pound Raven eating a jelly doughnut while she stood there. He rushed over to Robin.
"Is she okay? She's-she's . . huge!"
"That's the real her," said Robin never turning from his stare out toward the crowd.
"But . . she was always so . . um, cute looking?"
"She says that was a spell cast on her by an evil mage."
The Mayor sighed in frustration. They were all a bit freakish, except for Robin and the Kid Flash boy and he wore the tightest outfit not in a ballet. But this was too much. Raven wasn't cute or interesting now like the green boy or the girl who looked like she'd overdone the sprayed on tan. Oh, what the hell were their names?! She was just plain . . . fat!

The mayor spoke for a minute about what great role models the Titans were for Jump City's youth. Then he turned over the podium to Robin. Only, to his exasperation, Robin immediately turned it over to Raven. She waddled up to the micro, still eating her jelly doughnut.
"Hi, everybody. You may be wondering why I look like this. Well, this is the real me. That weird skinny version of me was the result of a spell cast on me. I was never comfortable in that skinny body. It always felt like the real me was trying to burst out. It wasn't even mentally comfortable. It included a element of amnesia so that I would forget what I really look like. And this is the real me," she said squeezing the sides of her massive, spherical body.
"But don't worry. I still have all my powers and I'll be just as good as superhero even though I'm no longer a skinny butt like him or him," she said gesturing to Kid Flash and Beast Boy to her side.

She took some questions and immediately divulged that she now weighed 487 pounds. She posed for pictures, letting photographers shoot her from the front, with her massive cow udder breasts and from the rear with her pachyderm-like butt. Then she flew off with the others, carried by a spell of black energy.

The press was merciless. For the next few days, every paper, tv station showed pictures captioned with things like "Ate the Raven, Ever More" and "Super Fat Super Hero".
Separately, all of her teammates offered support to her, worried that the scathing criticism would hurt her. But she was immensely strong about it. And true to her word, she was just as good a super hero as before.
Running speed and gymnastics had never been the strength she brought to the team anyway. She conjured up power from other dimensions using spells. And, if anything, she was more powerful now. It had nothing to do with her newly corpulent body but with the peace of mind it gave her that she was helping girls who couldn't live up to unrealistic standards of slenderness. Though it was hard to cross her legs the right way any more. She had to get help from Beast Boy once. Her thighs were so thick now. Her mediation improved as well.
Doctor Light thought he'd greatly improved his powers, some kind of photon ray supposedly. The Titans rushed out to stop him. He zapped Kid Flash and Beast Boy and was aiming for Starfire flying above. But, Azareth, Metrion, Zinthos! She projected enough black energy to wipe him out easily. She crushed cinder block like nothing a few days later.
It was true. The others could tell. She was even more powerful now than before.

And then a funny thing started in the press. Editors, writers and photographers who didn't look anything like models in Vogue or GQ but who'd always been embarrassed about it started to feel a little less defensive. An item or two in the Jump City Times actually made fun of what skinny asses Robin, Beast Boy and Kid Flash were. Another piece worried that Starfire was anorexic. And then there started to appear puff pieces, not many and not frequently, but they were definitely there, in newspapers and magazines, on Fox news and CNN. They started doing positive pieces about Raven.

The momentum swung so far around that the Teen Titans boys had all spent a time or two in front of a mirror not luxuriating in pride at their slenderness but wondering if they weren't too skinny.

At dinnner one night, they all told Raven how proud they were of the change she'd made in people's attitudes and what's more . . .
1511.title: I'm here.  I've got a giant rear.  Get used to it!
